column5: Devechi and Divichibazar) is a city in and the capital of the Şabran Rayon of Azerbaijan.

column2: Şabran received its city status in 1961. The name of Şabran comes from an historic medieval town of the same name that was a port some 15km further north.

column1: The officially registered population of Şabran in 2010 was 23
column2: 248. Azerbaijanis and Tats are the largest ethnic groups.
